definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: HKUST also has one of the best business schools in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 香港科大同時擁有其中一所亞洲最棒的商學院。

sentences.english: Don't worry about risk the way it is taught at Wharton.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心沃頓商學院所教的風險。

sentences.english: I went to B-School about 10 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 大約十年前我進入商學院學習。

sentences.english: She is a pre-business major and wants to study accounting or actuarial science. She heard UW-Madison’s business school had a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 她將要進入商學院，想要攻讀會計或是精算。

sentences.english: The runup in business school applications during the recession has created a windfall for essay writers.
sentences.chinese: 衰退期間湧現的商學院申請令論文寫手大發橫財。

sentences.english: My duff transcript did not faze the schools I applied to.
sentences.chinese: 我那份改頭換面的成績單，並沒有引起商學院的疑慮。

sentences.english: I have HBSHavard Business School) in my crosshair .
sentences.chinese: 我的目標就是上哈佛商學院。

sentences.english: The Sprott MBA for professionals gives you the knowledge to compete .
sentences.chinese: 卡爾頓大學斯波特商學院提供給你所需要的知識。

sentences.english: Here’s a video of a Darden case study class.
sentences.chinese: 這裏有一個達登商學院案例研究課堂的視頻。

sentences.english: Heming joined the Guangdong University of Business Studies in 1994.
sentences.chinese: 和明於1994年加入廣東商學院。

sentences.english: After two years she decided to move to the South and successfully applied for a position at Nanguo Business College.
sentences.chinese: 兩年後她決定遷往南方，最後順利受聘於南國商學院。

sentences.english: I am excited to be at NanGuo Business College to teach English.
sentences.chinese: 我很高興能在南國商學院教授英語。

sentences.english: Business and law schools achieve good results with big classes.
sentences.chinese: 商學院和法學院上的是大課，但是收效更佳。

sentences.english: Know that b-schools want you as much as you want them.
sentences.chinese: 商學院需要你就像你需要它們一樣。

sentences.english: A is its full-time outstanding faculty in the Asian marketing training field.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲商學院最大的弱點是缺乏屬於全職的優秀師資。

sentences.english: The downturn has not been all bad news for HBS, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，經濟不景氣對於哈佛商學院來說是一個壞消息。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
peak/apex/world best/number one/finest (competitors)/top (figures in a certain field)
Asian area/the Far East/Asia Pacific region

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Zhong1 wen2 Da4 xue2
